alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 04 at 2:19PM CDT until April 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Dangerous Fire Weather Conditions Expected Tuesday and Wednesday... .Strong north-northwesterly winds on the backside of an exiting low pressure system, combined with dry conditions will bring about fire weather conditions for mainly the afternoon hours on Tuesday and Wednesday.. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 029...041 AND 042... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove...Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Winds...Northwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 16 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
